definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Yin2 chuan1]
Xiali, car brand by Tianjin FAW Xiali Motor Company
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
pinyin: Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: Western Xia dynasty 1038-1227 of Tangut people 黨項|党项 occupying modern Ningxia and parts of Gansu and Shaanxi, overthrown by Mongols

sentences.english: Patricia Neal raised money for children and adults who had suffered brain injuries.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里夏尼爾誰提出的兒童和成年人遭受腦損傷的錢。

sentences.english: After three years, Deborah tried to break off the relationship and escape from Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 三年後，黛博拉試圖結束這段關係，逃離約夏的掌控。

sentences.english: It has saved my post-shave legs from irritation and allowed me to wear shorts all summer long.
sentences.chinese: 它救了我的後刮鬍子腿從刺激和允許我穿短褲夏天長。

sentences.english: The music of the far-away summer flutters around the Autumn seeking its former nest.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠往了的夏之音樂，翱翔於秋間，尋求它的舊壘。

sentences.english: To Marc Chagall, the marriage with Bella Rosenfeld, his life, bears the best witness to love and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 與妻子蓓拉的婚姻，是夏卡爾感受愛與美最好的見證。

sentences.english: Our sterling silver strawberry charm captures the essence of this quintessentially summer fruit.
sentences.chinese: 我們由純銀製成的草莓吊飾，散發着夏曰果子的氣息。

sentences.english: In nineteen eighty-three, Patricia Neal suffered another personal tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 在一九八三年，帕特里夏尼爾再遭個人的悲劇。

sentences.english: Summer real phone notice, I won n't fix two wedding cancellations.
sentences.chinese: 夏真實電話裏通知修二，本人是不會取消婚禮的。

sentences.english: This is Xia here from BNG Enterprise in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我是夏，屬於BNG公司，在上海。

sentences.english: Shamire lives in the barn in Wyoming.
sentences.chinese: 夏米爾還活着，在懷俄明州的牲口棚裏。

sentences.english: Before leaving, aguero heard the name of summer Chang An is one leng.
sentences.chinese: 臨離開前，許儀聽到夏常安的名字就是一愣。

sentences.english: But mostly we gloried in our second spring at the summerhouse.
sentences.chinese: 但是最讓我們引以自豪的是夏舍裏的第二個春天。

sentences.english: Summer night Yang to call China when she is to pet a bath, he misunderstood.
sentences.chinese: 夏晚陽給萬華打電話時她正給寵物洗澡，他誤解了。

sentences.english: Summer slowly faded, and Grandpa died before it was time to bring in the harvest.
sentences.chinese: 夏曰逐步磨滅，爺爺在豐收前就棄世了。

sentences.english: Vegetation and dry in summer, Mikawa must not flow.
sentences.chinese: 草木夏枯，三川絕而不流。

sentences.english: In the heat of summer, cold of winter, I'm here.
sentences.chinese: 非論夏的炎氣，秋的寒衣，我都在這裏。

definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
